name: Re;member
storyline:
Huyuaki lived for most of his life with an amnesia responsible for 
take away your most important childhood memories. Now, when receiving 
his mother the key to a mysterious mansion on the border of the city and 
assurance that his questions would be answered, he did not 
hesitates to face the challenges that will come and continue 
heading towards the imminent destination.
summary: Re; member is an adventure, mystery, horror and puzzle game with a great focus on history and lasting two to three hours leading to three different endings. It was created by keespring in RPG Maker VX and translated from Japanese into Korean, Chinese, Spanish and English.
